snippet: A measure that passed with mostly Republican support — many Democrats found it too narrow — previewed a fight over how far Congress should go in changing immigration laws.
abstract: Measure easing visa restrictions for limited pool of foreign workers passes in House of Representatives with mostly Republican support, previewing a fight over how far Congress should go in changing immigration laws.
lead_paragraph: A measure that passed with mostly Republican support — many Democrats found it too narrow — previewed a fight over how far Congress should go in changing immigration laws.

headline.seo: House Votes to Ease Restrictions on Visas
headline.main: House Votes to Ease Visa Limits for Some Foreign Workers
headline.print_headline: House Votes To Ease Restrictions On Visas
